alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 19 at 3:57AM MST until November 19 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected along the SR-30 corridor as well as along the I-80 corridor from Wendover to Grassy Mountain.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
